Package utility

Class TimeManager

java.lang.Object
utility.TimeManager
public abstract class TimeManager extends Object
The TimeManager conducts all time-related responsibilities including compensating, comparing, combining, formatting, and calculating time differences.

    • combineDateTime

      public static ZonedDateTime combineDateTime(LocalDate date, LocalTime time)
      Combines a date and time into a ZonedDateTime of the UTC ZoneId.
      Parameters:
      date - The LocalDate date to be combined.
      time - The LocalTime time to be combined.
      Returns:
      ZonedDateTime created from the date and time.

    • createLocalTime

      public static LocalTime createLocalTime(int hour, int minute)
      Creates formatted LocalTime objects.

    • toLocal

      public static ZonedDateTime toLocal(ZonedDateTime time)
      Converts a ZonedDateTime to a new ZonedDateTime with a ZoneId matching the system's default.
      Parameters:
      time - The ZonedDateTime to be converted
      Returns:
      A ZonedDateTime with a ZoneId that matches the system.

    • toLocal

      public static ZonedDateTime toLocal(Timestamp time)
      Converts a Timestamp to a new ZonedDateTime with a ZoneId matching the system's default.
      Parameters:
      time - The Timestamp to be converted
      Returns:
      A ZonedDateTime with a ZoneId that matches the system.

    • EST

      public static ZonedDateTime EST(ZonedDateTime time)
      Converts a ZonedDateTime to a new ZonedDateTime with a ZoneId of America/New_York.
      Parameters:
      time - The ZonedDateTime to be converted
      Returns:
      A ZonedDateTime with a ZoneId that matches America/New_York.

    • EST

      public static LocalTime EST(LocalTime time)
      Converts a LocalTime argument into a LocalTime in EST.
      Parameters:
      time - LocalTime to be converted to EST.

    • reportEST

      public static String reportEST(ZonedDateTime time)
      Returns a formatted String in the format desired for Reports.
      Parameters:
      time - A ZonedDateTime object to be formatted.
      Returns:
      A String object with a formatted ZonedDateTime.

    • timestampUTC

      public static Timestamp timestampUTC()
      Creates a Timestamp with the value of the current time in UTC, formatted for SQL.
      Returns:
      Timestamp of ZonedDateTime.now() with the ZoneID of UTC.

    • timestamp

      public static Timestamp timestamp(ZonedDateTime time)
      Converts a ZonedDateTime into a TTimestamp, formatted for SQL.
      Parameters:
      time - A ZonedDateTime to be converted to a Timestamp.
      Returns:
      Timestamp created from time.

    • labelEST

      public static String labelEST(LocalTime time)
      Returns a label to be used on the AppointmentForm.
      Parameters:
      time - LocalTime is converted to EST to indicate local time in comparison to the user's system time.
      Returns:
      String containing time converted to EST.
